name: Tunescape
detailed_description: Are you ready to experience music in a whole new way?  Create incredible spaces by placing and manipulating objects.  Animate those objects to sync up with your favorite song, then share it with the Oasis/Metaverse/..wait, what are we calling this?  Let's just go with "the world".  Share it with the world! -- Using an inventory of basic objects, you're free to create whatever comes to mind.  A set of scenes to play out in time with a particular song?  Or maybe mock up an idea you've had floating in your head.  Or how about something a bit more abstract.  At any point during your building, you can animate the objects that you've placed. -- Sharing Tunescapes is as easy as opening the file.  Soon, you'll be able to browse others' creations and share with a click of a button.  A big part of this Early Access time will be devoted to setting up the in-app interface to download and share Tunescapes from all kinds of other creative people. -- Music is everywhere in our lives.  It's a universal language.  Experience your favorite tracks in an entirely new way, or discover new music by exploring what other people are creating Tunescapes for.  So kick back and enjoy unique worlds brought to life around you!
about_the_game: Are you ready to experience music in a whole new way?  Create incredible spaces by placing and manipulating objects.  Animate those objects to sync up with your favorite song, then share it with the Oasis/Metaverse/..wait, what are we calling this?  Let's just go with "the world". short_description: Do you want to make VR music videos?  Cuz this is how you make VR music videos.  Well, experiences, since you'll be inside it.  Build, animate, share, and view what others have made.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i-5500 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or equivalent
  • Storage: 380 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
